title: Resolve Damaged Item from Online Order
description: A customer calls to report that an item they received from an online order arrived broken.

tasks.description: Look up the customer's online order using their name or order number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the correct order in the order management system.

tasks.description: Apologize for the issue and offer the customer a choice of a refund or a replacement item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent provides clear resolution options.

tasks.description: The customer chooses a replacement. The agent creates a new, no-charge order for the same item to be shipped to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: A replacement order is created, resolving the customer's issue.
